definition: to throw/to toss/to fling/to cast/to abandon
to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲

sentences.english: The rubber particles adsorbed on the surface of the molds were removed by casting.
sentences.chinese: 吸附在模具表面的橡膠顆粒被去除的方式爲拋離式。

sentences.english: Chelsea were 11 points clear of Manchester United with Arsenal in third place.
sentences.chinese: 車路士以十一分拋離曼聯，阿仙奴居第三。

sentences.english: You never expect life to throw you so far off plan.
sentences.chinese: 你從來沒有料想到生活會將你遠遠拋離計劃。

sentences.english: Q. Are pacy players able to pull away from sluggish defenders?
sentences.chinese: 速度快的球員能夠拋離緩慢的防守隊員嗎？

sentences.english: After the first lap of the run, he outdistanced the others by several metres.
sentences.chinese: 在比賽的第一圈過後，他被別的選手拋離了好幾米。
